text: Started training with Coach Albert as an absolute beginner and I was able to get a fairly good handle on my shots within first few months. He teaches the techniques patiently with a very good understanding about your pace and ability to follow the training. He also flexible and easy to communicate regarding the schedules and lessons. Highly recommended Tennis coach based in Senkang area.

Coach Albert is very encouraging and patient ever since my first day with him (I started with zero tennis knowledge.) He is able to break down my mistakes and help me build strong tennis foundations. Highly recommended!
Coach Albert is patient and knowledgeable in tennis instruction! He can always identify my weaknesses and gives effective advice to rectify them. 100% would recommend!!üëç
